snippet: NASA said Monday that its Mars rover Curiosity had analyzed a Martian sand drift, but — alas — had not found signs of the building blocks of life.
abstract: NASA says that its Mars rover Curiosity had analyzed a Martian sand drift, but had not found signs of the building blocks of life.
lead_paragraph: NASA said Monday that its Mars rover Curiosity had analyzed a Martian sand drift, but — alas — had not found signs of the building blocks of life.

headline.seo: Mars Rover Finds No Signs of Life in Dirt
